resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS EventList ( EVENT_ID INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, EVENT_NAME VARCHAR(127) NOT NULL, NOTIFY INT DEFAULT 0, _DATE INT DEFAULT 0, VENUE VARCHAR(127), _DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(1024), IMAGE_URL VARCHAR(255), END_DATE INT DEFAULT 0, RULES VARCHAR(1024), MAX_USER INT DEFAULT 0, PDF VARCHAR(255), REGISTERED INT DEFAULT 0, SOCIETY INT DEFAULT 0, CATEGORY INT DEFAULT 0 );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS NotificationList ( EVENT_ID INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, EVENT_NAME VARCHAR(127), _DATE INT DEFAULT 0, GENERATED INT DEFAULT 0 );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Exhibition ( EVENT_ID INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, EVENT_NAME VARCHAR(127), NOTIFY INT DEFAULT 0, _DATE INT DEFAULT 0, VENUE VARCHAR(127), _DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(1024), IMAGE_URL VARCHAR(255), AUTHOR VARCHAR(127), PDF VARCHAR(254), GTALK INT DEFAULT 0 );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Coordinator ( NAME VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, EVENT_ID INT DEFAULT 0, EMAIL VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, MOBILE VARCHAR(15), DESIGNATION VARCHAR(255) );
